definition: Chenggong or Chengkung town in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
Failure is the mother of success.
pinyin: shi1 bai4 shi4 cheng2 gong1 zhi1 mu3

definition: success at one go/to succeed at the first attempt

pinyin: bu4 cheng2 gong1 bian4 cheng2 ren2

definition: Chenggong or Chengkung town in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan

pinyin: ji1 hui4 dai4 lai2 cheng2 gong1

sentences.english: Sucess depends on your endeavor and capability.
sentences.chinese: 成功與否取決於你的努力和能力。

sentences.english: But it was this sense of failure that made him determined to succeed in his new life.
sentences.chinese: 但就是這種失敗感使他決心在新的生活中取得成功。

sentences.english: The second failing is an ironic flipside of success.
sentences.chinese: 第二個失敗則是對歐元成功的諷刺。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a successful animal model of steroid-induced osteonecrosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的成功製作激素性骨壞死的動物模型。

sentences.english: Test, tweak, rinse and repeat until you succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在你成功之前，測試，調節，清理和重做。

sentences.english: Alckmin congratulated Hu Jintao upon the great success of his visit.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾克明祝賀胡錦濤此行取得圓滿成功。

sentences.english: It is now the highest-grossing independent British film of all time.
sentences.chinese: 如今，這已成爲迄今爲止最成功的英國獨立電影。

sentences.english: For now, let others help you be successful.
sentences.chinese: 但是目前，讓別人幫助你成功吧。

sentences.english: It is a shortcut to accomplishment and an easy escape from embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 它是走向成功的捷徑，也是擺脫困境的妙方。

sentences.english: But, she's never achieved chart success with her music.
sentences.chinese: 但是她的音樂從沒有成功的進入過排行榜。

sentences.english: During this period of 6 years, he quelled the nationalities' Risingup in Yunnan successfully.
sentences.chinese: 其間，他成功地鎮壓了滇東北各族人民起義。

sentences.english: The treatment proved to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 這種療法證明是成功的。

sentences.english: Reasons for higher success rates among women are difficult to isolate.
sentences.chinese: 女人高成功率的原因很難去單獨分析出。
成功取決於我們的努力。
結果是難以置信的成功。

sentences.english: No problem, I once played a 2-meter-high player successfully.
sentences.chinese: 沒問題，我曾經成功的防守一個2米高的球員。

definition: to be defeated/to lose/to fail (e.g. experiments)/failure/defeat/CL:次[ci4]
to arrest/to capture/to seize/to win (a set, a game etc)
a move/an action/in one move/at a stroke/in one go

quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
